news.title: Alf Clausen, Acclaimed Simpsons Composer, Dies at 84
news.summary: Clausen scored over 560 episodes of the beloved animated series and was nominated for 21 Emmy Awards for his work

news.title: New Music Releases and Upcoming Albums in 2025
news.summary: A regularly updated guide to the new albums, EPs, mixtapes, and projects getting released in the coming weeks and months
